releaseNotes:
Add supporting for changing of cursor presenting in Screen Capture source:
      make cursor invisible and add drawing additional image for current cursor's image.
      Add supporting for using of custom Microsoft Media Foundation Transform for implementation custom effects (for example - WaterMarkInjectorDemo, TextInjectorDemo).
      Add supporting of multidisplay outputs.
      Add supporting of DirectShow software filters.
summary: Simple SDK for capturing, recording and streaming video and audio from web-cams on Windows OS by Windows Media Foundation.
title: CaptureManager SDK
